name: Binge Watchers
profile:
Welcome to the place where we can talk about TV! Reviews, News, Discussions and whatever the hell we want to talk about. 
I binge shows like it's my job. I wish it were. We're all passionate about some show, character, story arc or something. 
So it doesn't matter if It's Doctor Who, Sons of Anarchy or Breaking Bad. Let's talk about it!

New videos Mondays Wednesdays and Fridays.
